statements: DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND account_id = 101;
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = 102 AND transaction_type = 'Withdrawal';
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE is_met = FALSE OR compliance_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM transaction_audit WHERE audit_action = 'approval' AND audit_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND auditor_id = 100;
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM transaction_audit WHERE transaction_id = 200 AND audit_result = 'Failed';
